sentences.en: [as noun slopping out]the indignity of slopping out.
at weekends he would slop about in his oldest clothes.
sentences.cn: 周末时他总是随意地穿些旧衣服。

sentences.en: Chuck Tent: Captives come here to eat slop cooked from corn.
sentences.cn: 简易的饭馆: 俘虏们在这里吃些玉米做的粗食.

sentences.en: Coffee slopped over the rim of her cup.
sentences.cn: 咖啡从她的杯口溢了出来。

sentences.en: Don't slip - slop, as a lady.
sentences.cn: 走路别出声, 要像个淑女.
不要对女孩子们过分热情.

sentences.en: Don't slop your coffee in the saucer like that.
sentences.cn: 看你,别把咖啡洒得满盘子都是. ”

sentences.en: I had to slop through the rain.
sentences.cn: 我不得不在雨中溅水而过.

sentences.en: If anything can put Slop down, Arabin will do it.
sentences.cn: 要是有什么办法可以把斯洛普压制下去, 阿拉宾保管会做的.

sentences.en: If you roll a ball up a slop, it will roll down again.
sentences.cn: 如果你把球滚上斜坡, 它还会滚下来.

sentences.en: In cups of rocks It'slops: flop , slop, slap : bounded in barrels.
sentences.cn: 它在岩石凹陷处迸溅着: 唏哩哗啦, 就像是桶里翻腾的酒.

sentences.en: Oh , don't slop and gush and be sentimental.
sentences.cn: 别这样婆婆妈妈:淌眼抹泪的啦.

sentences.en: Pay attention about your business, and slop over your right.
sentences.cn: 管好你自己的事, 你超越权限了.

sentences.en: Precipitation, especially the persistent rain, lowers the slop stability.
sentences.cn: 大气降水, 尤其是持续性降雨, 使得边坡稳定性下降.

sentences.en: She used to slop around all day in old jeans and sweatshirts.
sentences.cn: 以前,她时常整天穿着旧牛仔裤和运动衫闲逛.

sentences.en: The practical circuit and design method of slop compensation are also given.
sentences.cn: 阐述了峰值电流控制的各项特点,给出了实际斜坡补偿电路及设计方法.

sentences.en: The ski slop was situated just outside the town.
With each wave, more water slopped into the cabin.
sentences.cn: 随着一个个浪头打来，更多的水漫进了船舱。

words.tran_cn: 倾斜的；有坡度的；成斜坡的

trans.tran_cn: 污水，粪便与废水，宽松的罩衣，剩菜屑

trans.tran_en: if liquid slops somewhere, it moves around or over the edge of a container in an uncontrolled way

trans.tran_cn: 溢出，泼出，在泥浆（或雪泥）中走
（液体）晃出，使（某物）溢出或泼出，休息，放松，偷懒
